comment_data.body: No need for `TOX_MAX_NAME_LENGTH * 2` when the previous name is added in write_to_log?
No need for `TOX_MAX_NAME_LENGTH * 2` when the previous name is added in write_to_log?

commit.message:
feat: Add log hints and add some missing log write events

The hints will allow us to re-colourize the entire log
in the future, and may also be useful for third-party
tools
